description: Acrostic

name: worst_pain
title: a. At its worst in the last week
description:
5. BPI Pain Intensity 

Please rate your pain by indicating the one number that best describes your pain (BPI pain intensity): a. At its worst in the last week

name: least_pain

description:
5. BPI Pain Intensity

name: average_pain

description:
5. BPI Pain Intensity

name: pain_now
title: d. Right now
description:
5. BPI Pain Intensity 

Please rate your pain by indicating the one number that best describes your pain (BPI pain intensity): d. Right now

name: bpi_pain_intensity
title: BPI pain intensity
description:
5. BPI Pain Intensity 

Please rate your pain by indicating the one number that best describes your pain (BPI pain intensity): BPI pain intensity[calculation: sum([worst_pain],[least_pain],[average_pain],[pain_now])]

name: gen_ac
title: A. General Activity
description:
BPI Pain Interference 

6. What number best describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with the following: A. General Activity

name: mood_b
title: B. Mood
description:
BPI Pain Interference 

6. What number best describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with the following: B. Mood

name: walk_c
title: C. Walking Ability
description:
BPI Pain Interference 

6. What number best describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with the following: C. Walking Ability

name: norm_work
title: D. Normal Work (includes both work outside the home and housework)
description:
BPI Pain Interference 

6. What number best describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with the following: D. Normal Work (includes both work outside the home and housework)

name: relat_e
title: E. Relations with other people
description:
BPI Pain Interference 

6. What number best describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with the following: E. Relations with other people

name: sleep_f
title: F.  Sleep
description:
BPI Pain Interference 

6. What number best describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with the following: F.  Sleep

name: enjoy_life
title: G. Enjoyment of life
description:
BPI Pain Interference 

6. What number best describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with the following: G. Enjoyment of life

name: bpi_pain_interference
title: BPI Pain interference
description:
BPI Pain Interference 

6. What number best describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with the following: BPI Pain interference[calculation: sum([gen_ac],[mood_b],[walk_c],[norm_work],[relat_e],[sleep_f], [enjoy_life])]

name: bpi_global_pain_severity_total
title: 7. BPI GLOBAL Pain Severity:
description:
BPI Pain Interference 

6. What number best describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with the following: 7. BPI GLOBAL Pain Severity:[calculation: ([bpi_pain_interference]+[bpi_pain_intensity])/11]

name: disability
title: 8. Are you currently waiting for a response to an application for disability? (Pending is excluded)
description: DISABILITY CLAIM SCREENER: 8. Are you currently waiting for a response to an application for disability? (Pending is excluded)

name: par_q6
title: 12. Have you ever been diagnosed with an inflammatory arthritis? Specifically, lupus, rheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, psoriatic arthritis. (If patient has 'arthritis' but cannot define then they are eligible)
description: ADDITIONAL SCREENING QUESTIONS: 12. Have you ever been diagnosed with an inflammatory arthritis? Specifically, lupus, rheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, psoriatic arthritis. (If patient has 'arthritis' but cannot define then they are eligible)

name: income
title: 8. When you consider your current household income from all sources, would you say that you are...
description: DEMOGRAPHICS: 8. When you consider your current household income from all sources, would you say that you are...
encodings: 1=Comfortable|2=Have just enough to make ends meet|3=Do NOT have enough to make ends meet|4=Don't know or refused to answer

name: employment
title: 9. Which of the following best describes your current employment (work) situation?
description: DEMOGRAPHICS: 9. Which of the following best describes your current employment (work) situation?
encodings: 1=Employed for wages|2=Self-employed|3=Out of work for more than 1 year|4=Out of work for less than 1 year|5=Homemaker|6=Student|7=Retired|8=Unable to work (for health or disability reasons)|10=Other|9=Don't know or refused to answer

name: marital_status
title: 10. What is your marital status?
description: DEMOGRAPHICS: 10. What is your marital status?
encodings: 1=Married|2=Divorced|3=Widowed|4=Separated|5=Never Married|6=A member of an unmarried couple|7=Don't Know or refused to answer

name: education
title: 11. What is the highest grade or level of schooling that you completed?
description: DEMOGRAPHICS: 11. What is the highest grade or level of schooling that you completed?
encodings: 1=8th grade or less|2=Some high school|3=High School or GED|4=Technical trade or business school|5=2-year college degree or some college|6=4-year college degree|7=Post-graduate degree (e.g., masters or doctorate)|8=Don't know or refused to answer

name: nervous_edge
title: a. Feeling Nervous, anxious, or on edge
description:
14. GAD-7 Anxiety

Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?: a. Feeling Nervous, anxious, or on edge
encodings: 0=Not at all|1=Several Days|2=Over half the days|3=Nearly every day

name: worry_edge
title: b. Worry too much about different things
description:
14. GAD-7 Anxiety

Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?: b. Worry too much about different things
encodings: 0=Not at all|1=Several Days|2=Over half the days|3=Nearly every day

name: trouble_relaxing
title: c. Trouble Relaxing
description:
14. GAD-7 Anxiety

Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?: c. Trouble Relaxing
encodings: 0=Not at all|1=Several Days|2=Over half the days|3=Nearly every day

name: sit_still
title: d. Being so restless that it's hard to sit still
description:
14. GAD-7 Anxiety

Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?: d. Being so restless that it's hard to sit still
encodings: 0=Not at all|1=Several Days|2=Over half the days|3=Nearly every day

name: easy_annoyed
title: e. Becoming easily annoyed
description:
14. GAD-7 Anxiety

Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?: e. Becoming easily annoyed
encodings: 0=Not at all|1=Several Days|2=Over half the days|3=Nearly every day

name: afraid_awful
title: f. Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen
description:
14. GAD-7 Anxiety

Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?: f. Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen
encodings: 0=Not at all|1=Several Days|2=Over half the days|3=Nearly every day

name: not_able_to_control
title: g. Not being able to stop or control worrying
description:
14. GAD-7 Anxiety

Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?: g. Not being able to stop or control worrying
encodings: 0=Not at all|1=Several Days|2=Over half the days|3=Nearly every day

name: gad7_function
title: GAD-7 Anxiety
description:
14. GAD-7 Anxiety

Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?: GAD-7 Anxiety[calculation: sum([nervous_edge],[worry_edge],[trouble_relaxing],[sit_still],[easy_annoyed],[afraid_awful])]

name: little_do
title: a. Little interest or pleasure in doing things
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: a. Little interest or pleasure in doing things
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

title: b. Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: b. Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

name: fall_sleep
title: c. Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: c. Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

name: tired_energy
title: d. Feeling tired or having little energy
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: d. Feeling tired or having little energy
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

name: poor_eating
title: e. Poor appetite or overeating
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: e. Poor appetite or overeating
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

name: let_down
title: f. Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure, or have let yourself or family down
description:

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: f. Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure, or have let yourself or family down

name: con_things
title: g. Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: g. Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

name: move_usual
title: h. Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed.  Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: h. Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed.  Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

name: phq8_questions
title: PHQ8 Total
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: PHQ8 Total[calculation: sum([little_do],[feel_down],[fall_sleep],[tired_energy],[poor_eating],[let_down],[con_things],[move_usual])]

name: groc_quest
title: 18. Please rate the overall condition of your pain from the time that you began treatment until now (Indicate only one):
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: 18. Please rate the overall condition of your pain from the time that you began treatment until now (Indicate only one):
encodings: 1=Quite a bit worse|2=Moderately worse|3=Somewhat worse|4=A little bit worse|5=A tiny bit worse|6=About the same|7=A tiny bit better|8=A little bit better|9=Somewhat better|10=Moderately better|11=Quite a bit better

name: pain
title: a. I worry all the time about whether the pain will end
description:
19. Pain  (PCS)

Using the following scale, please indicate the degree to which you have these thoughts and feelings when you are experiencing pain.: a. I worry all the time about whether the pain will end
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 To a slight degree|2=2 To a moderate degree|3=3 To a great degree|4=4 All the time

encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 To a slight degree|2=2 To a moderate degree|3=3 To a great degree|4=4 All the time

title: c. It's terrible and I think it's never going to get any better

encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 To a slight degree|2=2 To a moderate degree|3=3 To a great degree|4=4 All the time

encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 To a slight degree|2=2 To a moderate degree|3=3 To a great degree|4=4 All the time

encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 To a slight degree|2=2 To a moderate degree|3=3 To a great degree|4=4 All the time

encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 To a slight degree|2=2 To a moderate degree|3=3 To a great degree|4=4 All the time

encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 To a slight degree|2=2 To a moderate degree|3=3 To a great degree|4=4 All the time

encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 To a slight degree|2=2 To a moderate degree|3=3 To a great degree|4=4 All the time

encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 To a slight degree|2=2 To a moderate degree|3=3 To a great degree|4=4 All the time

encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 To a slight degree|2=2 To a moderate degree|3=3 To a great degree|4=4 All the time

name: pcs_total
title: PCS Total
description:
19. Pain  (PCS)

Using the following scale, please indicate the degree to which you have these thoughts and feelings when you are experiencing pain.: PCS Total[calculation: sum([pain],[go],[terrible],[awful],[stand],[worse],[events],[goaway],[mind],[hurts],[stop],[reduce],[happen])]

name: rumination
title: Rumination - sum of items h, i, j, k
description:
19. Pain  (PCS)

Using the following scale, please indicate the degree to which you have these thoughts and feelings when you are experiencing pain.: Rumination - sum of items h, i, j, k[calculation: sum([goaway],[mind],[hurts],[stop])]

name: magnification_sum
title: Magnification - sum of items f, g, m
description:
19. Pain  (PCS)

Using the following scale, please indicate the degree to which you have these thoughts and feelings when you are experiencing pain.: Magnification - sum of items f, g, m[calculation: sum([worse],[events],[happen])]

name: helplessness_sum
title: Helplessness - sum of items a, b, c, d, e, l
description:
19. Pain  (PCS)

Using the following scale, please indicate the degree to which you have these thoughts and feelings when you are experiencing pain.: Helplessness - sum of items a, b, c, d, e, l[calculation: sum([pain],[go],[terrible],[awful],[stand],[reduce])]

name: chores
title: a. Are you able to do chores such as vacuuming or yard work?
description:
20. PROMIS Adult self-report

Physical Function: a. Are you able to do chores such as vacuuming or yard work?
encodings: 5=5 - Without any difficulty|4=4 - With a little difficulty|3=3 - With some difficulty|2=2 - With much difficulty|1=1 - Unable to do

name: stairs
title: b. Are you able to go up and down stairs at a normal pace?
description:
20. PROMIS Adult self-report

Physical Function: b. Are you able to go up and down stairs at a normal pace?
encodings: 5=5 - Without any difficulty|4=4 - With a little difficulty|3=3 - With some difficulty|2=2 - With much difficulty|1=1 - Unable to do

name: walk
title: c. Are you able to go for a walk of at least 15 minutes?
description:
20. PROMIS Adult self-report

Physical Function: c. Are you able to go for a walk of at least 15 minutes?
encodings: 5=5 - Without any difficulty|4=4 - With a little difficulty|3=3 - With some difficulty|2=2 - With much difficulty|1=1 - Unable to do

name: shop
title: d. Are you able to run errands and shop?
description:
20. PROMIS Adult self-report

Physical Function: d. Are you able to run errands and shop?
encodings: 5=5 - Without any difficulty|4=4 - With a little difficulty|3=3 - With some difficulty|2=2 - With much difficulty|1=1 - Unable to do

name: phy_function
title:
PROMIS Total
Physical Function
description:
20. PROMIS Adult self-report

Physical Function: PROMIS Total
Physical Function[calculation: sum([chores],[stairs],[walk],[shop])]

Fatigue

In the past 7 days: a. How run-down did you feel on average?

title: c. I feel fatigued
description:

Fatigue

In the past 7 days: c. I feel fatigued
encodings: 1=1 Not at all|2=2 A little bit|3=3 Somewhat|4=4 Quite a bit|5=5 Very much

Fatigue

In the past 7 days: d. I have trouble starting things because I am tired

Fatigue

In the past 7 days: Fatigue Total[calculation: sum([rundown],[fatigued],[feel],[trouble])]

description:
